item.title: Real Madrid vs Benfica: Champions League – team news, start, lineups

item.title: Lebanon’s army tells soldiers to act after post comes under Israeli fire
item.content:encoded: Israeli attack carried out near Lebanese observation post being constructed in the Marjayoun area, Lebanese army says.

item.title: Three myths about the Russia economic war

item.content:encoded: Dozens of delegates walked out of Russian ambassador Gennady Gatilov’s speech to the UN conference on disarmament.

item.title: Iran cannot defeat US military might, but it can still win
item.content:encoded: Capitulation in the form of a deal will not stave off US aggression. Defiance through regional alliances could.

item.content:encoded: Egyptian series ‘People of the Land’ has stirred backlash from Israelis over its retelling of Israel’s crimes in Gaza.

item.title: Epstein files fallout: Muted US response vs political reckoning in Europe
item.content:encoded: The newly released Epstein files have triggered political fallout in the UK and parts of Europe, but far less in the US.

item.title: Ukraine marks four years of Russia’s war

item.content:encoded: A number of EU leaders prayed with Ukraine’s President Zelenskyy in Kyiv, to mark Russia's invasion anniversary.

item.title: Russia-Ukraine four years of war

item.title: New Trump tariffs take effect days after Supreme Court ruling
item.content:encoded: New tariffs on imported goods come into effect as Trump moves to rebuild his trade agenda after top court's ruling.

item.title: Residents raise alarm as violence-hit Guadalajara to host World Cup games
item.content:encoded: Mexican city set to host 2026 World Cup games erupts in violence after army kills the leader of a powerful drug cartel.
